医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
饮食中摄入过多的添加糖可能会增加患冠心病的风险个体膳食糖类型与冠心病风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/High-dietary-intake-of-added-sugars-could-increase-the-risk-of-coronary-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/High-dietary-intake-of-added-sugars-could-increase-the-risk-of-coronary-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68272765-a05d-41d8-9600-8095d85220dc Wed, 06 Sep 2023 05:24:00 -0400 High dietary intake of added sugars could increase the risk of coronary heart disease
布鲁克的新型 NeuraLeap 在光平面上提供前所未有的成像速度数字微镜设备的新颖使用为高级神经科学研究提供可变景深采集https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Brukere28099s-New-NeuraLeap-Delivers-Unprecedented-Imaging-Speed-Across-Optical-Planes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Brukere28099s-New-NeuraLeap-Delivers-Unprecedented-Imaging-Speed-Across-Optical-Planes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cafa6cef-9870-4bf0-897e-874e0c7997df Wed, 06 Sep 2023 05:19:00 -0400 Bruker’s New NeuraLeap Delivers Unprecedented Imaging Speed Across Optical Planes
快速疗法可能为轮班工人和乘坐飞机的旅行者提供延迟生物钟的实用选择研究人员检查了睡眠期间进行的快速疗法是否改变了睡眠结构，从而改变了人体生物钟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Flash-therapy-may-offer-a-practical-option-to-delay-the-circadian-clock-in-shift-workers-and-jet-旅行者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Flash-therapy-may-offer-a-practical-option-to-delay-the-circadian-clock-in-shift-workers-and-jet- Travelers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c266b32-8190-4476-ba0c-aaef1e20857a Wed, 06 Sep 2023 04:50:00 -0400 Flash therapy may offer a practical option to delay the circadian clock in shift workers and jet travelers
Clovibactin——一种改变游戏规则的无耐药性新型抗生素研究人员报告了一种新抗生素的发现，克洛巴汀。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Clovibactin-a-game-changing-novel-antibiotic-with-no-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Clovibactin-a-game-changing-novel-antibiotic-with-no-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbd0c842-8378-4ea4-b71d-b19e1c7dc95a Wed, 06 Sep 2023 04:13:00 -0400 Clovibactin - a game-changing novel antibiotic with no resistance
大丽花花提取物具有抗糖尿病特性吗？大丽花黄色花瓣提取物作为 2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 新型治疗方法的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Does-dahlia-flower-extract-have-anti-diabetic-properties.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Does-dahlia-flower-extract-have-anti-diabetic-properties.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f677505e-8e2f-4c4d-8fa6-e6104bb50566 Wed, 06 Sep 2023 03:26:00 -0400 Does dahlia flower extract have anti-diabetic properties?
小鼠早期病毒暴露会削弱疫苗反应，引发人类研究问题华盛顿大学的研究人员证明，家鼠早年接触多种病毒会抑制晚年对 SARS-CoV-2 疫苗接种的免疫反应。该研究引起了人们对常见小鼠模型在免疫学研究中的适用性的担忧，表明先前的病原体暴露可能是预测疫苗功效的一个重要变量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Early-viral-exposure-in-mice-weakens-vaccine-response-raise-questions-for- human-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Early-viral-exposure-in-mice-weakens-vaccine-response-raise-questions-for- human-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5764a66-4e90-4fc4-ba13-0a06ea72dfb9 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 23:50:00 -0400 Early viral exposure in mice weakens vaccine response, raising questions for human studies
研究确定了逆转卵巢癌耐药性的潜在目标对于每年 314,000 名被诊断患有卵巢癌的人来说，希望往往来自于顺铂等铂类药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Study-identizes-pottial-target-for-reversing-drug-resistance-in-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Study-identizes-pottial-target-for-reversing-drug-resistance-in-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9947014f-648c-4f7a-867f-5c59e1fb7e6b Tue, 05 Sep 2023 23:29:03 -0400 Study identifies potential target for reversing drug resistance in ovarian cancer
单价疫苗在对抗新的 Omicron 变种方面优于二价疫苗美国新研究发现 mRNA-1273.815（一种针对 Omicron XBB.1.5 变体的单价疫苗）与二价疫苗相比，可产生更高的中和抗体滴度。该研究支持在 2023-24 年战役中更新基于 XBB.1.5 的单价疫苗，以对抗新出现的变种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Monovalent-vaccine-outperforms-bivalent-in-fighting-new-Omicron-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Monovalent-vaccine-outperforms-bivalent-in-fighting-new-Omicron-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a8d32b3-3bd7-4381-9b40-10c0a3d714cc Tue, 05 Sep 2023 23:28:00 -0400 Monovalent vaccine outperforms bivalent in fighting new Omicron variants
研究人员获得 250 万美元奖金，用于开发针对胶质母细胞瘤的定制治疗方法来自加州大学洛杉矶分校琼森综合癌症中心的多学科研究团队获得了国防部颁发的 250 万美元转化团队科学奖，用于开发针对胶质母细胞瘤的定制治疗方法，胶质母细胞瘤是一种治疗选择有限的致命脑肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Researchers-receive-2425-million-award-to-develop-a-tailored-treatment-for-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/Researchers-receive-2425-million-award-to-develop-a-tailored-treatment-for-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ea90dc7-7b3d-49c0-9031-fc6c82927e6d Tue, 05 Sep 2023 23:24:59 -0400 Researchers receive $2.5 million award to develop a tailored treatment for glioblastoma
投资 5 亿英镑升级世界著名钻石光源设施英国科学技术大臣米歇尔·多尼兰 (Michelle Donelan) 今天宣布，将投资超过 5 亿英镑对一个突破性的科学设施进行升级和扩建，该设施启动了英国世界领先的新冠药物开发，并拥有针对艾滋病毒、疟疾和癌症等全球健康挑战的先进治疗方法。 （9 月 6 日星期三）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/World-renowned-Diamond-Light-Source-facility-to-be-upgraded-through-a-c2a3500-million-investment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230905/World-renowned-Diamond-Light-Source-facility-to-be-upgraded-through-a-c2a3500-million-investment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab051fa1-724a-422a-afb2-908947a981b3 Tue, 05 Sep 2023 23:20:18 -0400 World-renowned Diamond Light Source facility to be upgraded through a £500 million investment
